    ExpertCard

    This subclass of game is instantiated when selecting Expert Mode, it adds the coin and expert cards system

    This interface has the purpose of hiding methods and attributes in game, leaving the only useful for this scope.

    This class represents the Increment Max Movement Card, which effect is to increment the maximum movement possible for the player in that turn.

    SwapStudentsCard
    This class represents the card that allows the player to swap a maximum of two students from the entrance to the hall and vice versa.
